Incident ID: INC-1001
Title: Payment API Timeout Errors
Description: Users reported transaction failures with HTTP 503 errors.
Symptoms: Database connection timeout, connection pool at 98%, pod restarts, CrashLoopBackOff.
Root Cause: Database connection pool exhaustion after increased load.
Resolution: Increased DB pool size from 50 to 150, restarted pods, scaled read replicas.
Prevention: Add connection monitoring alert and auto scaling.
